item.title: Who am I?
item.description: Dear Amy, Who am I? What a vital question that is for any of us. It could take some time to answer! In fact, I have had to revisit it myself in recent years. The most valiant attempt I know of to grapple with this is by Dietrich Bonhoeffer, a German pastor who was imprisoned in Flossenb√ºrg concentration camp by the Nazis during World War II. He was executed just one month before the end of the war.
